doc.repnme: Mitigating project risks : World Bank support for government guarantees
doc.abstracts: The World Bank has two distinct financial vehicles to support developing country governments wanting to provide guarantees to attract private investors: issuing guarantees to investors and making loans to host governments to fund guarantees. The author explains how these vehicles work and reviews some of their advantages and disadvantages.
